signUp.subject: Verify your Email account
signUp.body:
Welcome to Student Service Request System - DAIICT!

Please click on the below mentioned link to verify your email.
Click here to verify

forgetPassword.subject: Password Reset Link
forgetPassword.body:
Hello {{daiictId}},
Please click on the link below to reset your password.
Click here to reset password

passwordChanged.subject: Password successfully changed
passwordChanged.body:
Hello,

This is a confirmation mail for successful change in password for your account - {{daiictId}}

cancelCart.subject: Order has been cancelled
cancelCart.body:
Hello {{daiictId}},

Your order {{orderId}} has been cancelled due to {{cancelReason}}.
